pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Evolutionary Rates in an OU Framework // Calculates and compares rate differences of continuous character evolution under Brownian motion and a new set of Ornstein-Uhlenbeck based Hansen models that allow the strength of selection and stochastic motion to vary across selective regimes. Beaulieu et al (2012) doi:10.1111/j.1558-5646.2012.01619.x.
